# Learning Statistics {#sec-learningStatistics}

Here are resources for learning statistics:

- OpenIntro Statistics: <https://www.openintro.org/book/os/>
- Introductory Statistics: <https://openstax.org/details/books/introductory-statistics-2e>

# Workshops {#sec-workshops}

Here are potential sources for workshops on various statistical topics:

- <https://centerstat.org>
- <https://smart-workshops.com>
- <https://www.statscamp.org>
- <https://statisticalhorizons.com>
- <https://stats.oarc.ucla.edu/other/mult-pkg/seminars/>
- <https://datascience-workshop.uiowa.edu/resources>
